title: High Public Debt Service
description: In 2023, Angola had a public and publicly guaranteed debt service amounting to 13.84% of its GNI, indicating a significant financial burden.

title: Low Educational Attainment
description: As of 2021, only 0.13% of Angola's population aged 25 and older had attained at least a Bachelor's degree, reflecting low educational attainment.

title: High Out-of-Pocket Health Expenditure
description: In 2018, 35.53% of Angola's population spent more than 10% of their household consumption or income on out-of-pocket health care expenses.

title: High Remittance Transaction Costs
description: In 2021, the average transaction cost of sending remittances from Angola was 16.86%, one of the highest in the world.
